text: 'the los angeles city council wants know whether president trump violated federal law using office presidency enrich family vote council friday passed resolution asking congress investigate whether trump violated constitution foreign emoluments clause committed high crimes misdemeanors could lead impeachment clause designed ensure presidents influenced gifts aid foreign government resolution authored councilman bob blumenfield represents western san fernando valley putting city la record investigate trump said blumenfield spokesman jake flynn acknowledged resolution legal weight advertisement flynn said trump relationship philippines president rodrigo duterte investigated light new story trump tower manila set open soon philippines president deadly tactics suspected drug dealers widely criticized human rights groups blumenfield office worked resolution west valley resistance group supports investigating trump possible impeachable offenses similar resolutions passed richmond alameda berkeley calif well cambridge mass cities towns according group councilman mitch englander republican city council absent friday vote also missing councilmen jose huizar paul koretz joe buscaino englander explained statement purposely missed vote walked feel voting impeach president purview los angeles city council said focusing public safety fixing roads cleaning neighborhoods dakotacdsmith dakotasmith latimescom update pm article updated additional comments flynn information absent councilmen article originally published may pm updates pm article updated comment councilman mitch englander additional background article originally published pm '
